SQLQueryStrings.SQLQueryString: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ISC_Users where Username = @Username COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS

BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ISC_Users where Username = @Username COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS) BEGIN INSERT INTO ISC_Users (Username,Password) VALUES (@Username,@Password) END END
